alert.note: Alert for Holmes; North Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 9:11PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Walton and southwestern Holmes Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 811 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near De Funiak Springs, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Ponce De Leon, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Douglass Crossroad, Sand Hill, Alpine Heights, De Funiak Spring Airport, Rock Hill, Eucheeanna, Pleasant Hill, Pleasant Ridge, Center Ridge, Piney Grove and Argyle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
